name: HR Shapers
description: We are a network of Companies that have joined their forces and competencies to shape the world of work together.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: We Shape the World of Work for the Better.
ShortDescription: We believe that HR will have an increasingly important role to play in order shape our organizations as we exit from COVID-19.
enhanced_description: HR Shapers is a Mumbai-based network of companies established in 2014, collaborating to reshape the world of work. They specifically focus on the evolving and increasingly important role of HR, especially in a post-COVID-19 environment. The primary aim is to boost hiring manager confidence and productivity. The services offered fall under recruiting, including staffing services and HR consulting, leveraging their wide network and excellent services.
